column1: '''Melbourne House''' is one of the oldest video game developers still to exist. Founded in [[1980]] as '''Beam Software''', Melbourne House was first owned by [[wikipedia:Atari
column2: Atari]], and as of [[2006]] by [[wikipedia:Krome Studios
column3: Krome Studios]]. Except games it published aswell books about [[wikipedia:Personal computer
column4: computers]] and games, by its subsidiary ''' Melbourne House Publishers, Limited.'''.
